graphs.query: logfile contains 'axonius' | columns internal_axon_id, specific_data.data.hostname, specific_data.data.name, specific_data.data.last_seen | sort -specific_data.data.last_seen | limit 50
graphs.title: Axonius Assets

graphs.query: logfile contains 'axonius' | group total_adapters = max(adapter_list_length) | columns total_adapters
graphs.title: Total Adapters
